# CHOIR

## Vignette

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
if (!requireNamespace("scRNAseq", quietly = TRUE)) BiocManager::install("scRNAseq")
library(scRNAseq)
library(Seurat)
library(CHOIR)
```

### Example data

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, results = FALSE}
obj_norm <- readRDS(projr::projr_path_get(
  "raw-data", "choir", "lamanno_mouse_adult-obj_norm.rds"
))
```

### CHOIR

```{r}
obj_choir <- CHOIR(
  obj_norm,  n_cores = 2
)
```
